Episodes.Title: My Name Is Inmate 28301-016 (1)
Episodes.Plot: Earl begins his prison sentence. Meanwhile, Joy tries to repay Earl by taking care of Randy (who is struggling to adjust) and a prison bully is looking for Earl.

Episodes.Title: My Name Is Inmate 28301-016 (2)
Episodes.Plot: Earl begins his prison sentence. Meanwhile, Joy tries to repay Earl by taking care of Randy (who is struggling to adjust) and a prison bully is looking for Earl.

Episodes.Title: The Gangs Of Camden County
Episodes.Plot: Earl is offered a deal to receive a lesser sentence if he can resolve problems between rival gangs. But, he finds the task harder than he expected. Meanwhile, Randy looks for ways to join Earl in prison.

Episodes.Title: The Frank Factor
Episodes.Plot: Joy visits Earl in prison and they are surprised to meet an old friend who is also in prison. The three reminisce about their past and how they met.

Episodes.Title: Creative Writing
Episodes.Plot: Earl is given an assignment after attending a prison class which focuses on creative writing: to write a story. Soon Earl realises that writing is harder than he thought.

Episodes.Title: Frank's Girl
Episodes.Plot: It's conjugal visiting day at the prison and since no one is visiting Earl, Frank wants Earl to explain to his girlfriend why he cannot see her today. Things don't go as planned and Frank's girlfriend dumps him because of Earl. Earl is blames himself and vows to get them back together.

Episodes.Title: Our Other Cops is On! (1)
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy watch the filming of Cops in Camden County where the different situations are slightly related to Earl. Meanwhile, Kenny's hatred for Earl is caught on camera.

Episodes.Title: Our Other Cops is On! (2)
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy watch the filming of Cops in Camden County where the different situations are slightly related to Earl. Meanwhile, Kenny's hatred for Earl is caught on camera.

Episodes.Title: Randy in Charge (...Of Our Days and Our Nights)
Episodes.Plot: The Warden ask Earl to make a skit called 'scared straight' that will stop kids from committing crimes and stay out of jail. Meanwhile, Randy uses his authority to make Earl's life difficult in prison.

Episodes.Title: Midnight Bun
Episodes.Plot: Joy enlists the help of Darnell to expediate the baby's birth. Meanwhile, Frank escapes from prison when Randy takes the convicts out for ice cream. Elsewhere, Catalina baby-sits Dodge and Earl Jr.

Episodes.Title: Burn Victim
Episodes.Plot: Earl helps the Warden solve another jail house problem between an inmate and his victims. Later Earl realizes that planning a prom for the inmates might deplete his lottery winnings.

Episodes.Title: Early Release
Episodes.Plot: When Earl finds out that the Warden has destroyed all the certificates that would grant him early release from prison, he seeks the help of his friends to escape.

Episodes.Title: Bad Earl
Episodes.Plot: Earl is having difficulty re-adjusting to life on the outside. He returns to his old ways after he encounters Ralph. Randy plans an intervention for Earl on Christmas morning.

Episodes.Title: I Won't Die With a Little Help from My Friends (1)
Episodes.Plot: After a car accident Earl is put in a coma and finds himself in an alternate world shown as a sitcom, while his friends try to keep him alive.

Episodes.Title: I Won't Die With a Little Help from My Friends (2)
Episodes.Plot: After a car accident Earl is put in a coma and finds himself in an alternate world shown as a sitcom, while his friends try to keep him alive.

Episodes.Title: Stole a Motorcycle
Episodes.Plot: While Earl is still in a coma, Randy starts to believe that he can help Earl get better by crossing things off the list.

Episodes.Title: No Heads And A Duffle Bag
Episodes.Plot:
When Randy visits his parents to make up for their ruined vacation, he realizes that he forgot to tell them about Earl's prison sentence and the following coma at all.
A flashback takes us back to when Earl and Randy ruined their parents vacation due to a stolen duffel bag full of weed.

Episodes.Title: Killerball
Episodes.Plot: When the hospital wants to get rid of Earl, Randy decides to take care of his brother by himself. But instead of working on the list for Earl, he uses Earl's help to cross things off in order to help him get better.
Episodes.GuestStars: Katie Sullivan, Christopher Thornton, Cooper Thornton, Kevin Rankin, Brandon Killham

Episodes.Title: Love Octagon
Episodes.Plot: When Earl finally wakes up from his coma, he believes in Karma again and considers Billie his soul mate.

Episodes.Title: Girl Earl
Episodes.Plot: Inspired by Earl, Billie starts a list of her own and when Earl is getting annoyed by Billie's little habits, he decides to focus on working on the list instead. He picks a task that is on both of their lists, atones for the injury of a champion grocery-bagger and discovers a unique talent of his own. But Earl soon finds out that they have different ways of interpreting Karma.

Episodes.Title: Camdenites (1)
Episodes.Plot: When relational problems arise between Earl and Billie, he is forced to choose between Karma and her.

Episodes.Title: Camdenites (2)
Episodes.Plot: When relational problems arise between Earl and Billie, he is forced to choose between Karma and her.
